author: Simon Difford
description: Absinthe based but incredibly subtle. Absinthe combines wonderfully with wine and apple.
name: Le Minuit
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
